You can control the two portuguese knights and its servant. Its all controlled by the keys. They auto-attack and auto-retaliate. You must find the exit of the current level, on your journey to kill the master demon that is bringing demons to Tras-os-Montes.
Hundreds of civilians fled to Brazil and we must protect our land!.
Entryway
Exit door
The Knight with the two swords is the stronger, but has limited defense.
The one with a big shield has better defense and a capable attack, but sometimes fail to deal any damage.
The servant is just cannon fodder, as usual for any servant of the time.
Your knights will always start near this door.
You must lead all three characters to the exit in order to finish a level. If any of them die, it will respawn at the next level.
To slain monsters, just move in the direction of the monster.
Monsters
They always try seeking you and try a sneak attack.
